name: Star Trek: En Territoire Alien
description: Star Trek : En Territoire Alien is a strategy game where you would have to fight against 8472 species, Federation or Klingon, you will have to manage your bases, produce powerful ships, improve your weapons in order to defeat this new enemy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Window Vista Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 50 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Soundblaster
recommended_requirements: OS: Window7 Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Standard Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Soundblaster
